definition: A term used to describe something that endures or remains unchanged over time, often referring to a quality, characteristic, or state that remains constant or persistent. It is commonly used in contexts related to art, literature, or philosophy to describe the lasting impact or significance of a particular work, idea, or concept.

examples.german: Die bleibende Erinnerung an diese Reise wird mich immer begleiten.
examples.english: The lasting memory of this trip will always stay with me.

examples.german: Die bleibende Wirkung dieser Entscheidung ist noch nicht absehbar.
examples.english: The lasting effect of this decision is not yet foreseeable.

examples.german: Die bleibende Bedeutung dieser Entdeckung kann nicht unterschätzt werden.
examples.english: The lasting significance of this discovery cannot be underestimated.
